entry.title: Centos7 upgrade python2 to python3
entry.content:
Linux’s centos7 has python2.7.5 installed by default, and needs to be upgraded to the latest version

View python version

View soft link direction

Rename soft connection

Download and unzip python

Install python

python3.6.4 has been installed in the system. python2.7.5 has been renamed due to soft link. and so. When you check the python version. Will not exist

Let the system use Python 3.6.4 by default

The direction of the soft link has been modified. Yum cannot be used at this time. Need to edit the yum configuration file

Put the file header

Change to

Save and exit! shift+: enter wq

Create a new link

Verification is successful
entry.summary: Linux’s centos7 has python2.7.5 installed by default, and needs to be upgraded to the latest version

entry.title: v2ray VS Trojan
entry.content:
Trojan
15%
V2ay
90%

v2ray vmess multi-layer encryption is too safe to change socks, trojan stands at attention and stands! ! ! Do you really understand v2ray?

I discussed trojan and v2ray with you in Telegram before! So I am writing an article today! Bloggers have used v2ray for many years, can they be very responsible to tell everyone that v2ray is currently the most secure encryption, multi-layer encryption, is it considered insecure and outdated? It’s nonsense! No matter what FQ service you use here, we respect it, but we really feel that some UPs are ignorant and mislead many people. At present, v2ray has been taken over by the v2fly project and the public test of vless is also effective! And other important updates…! ! So why am I writing this blog post today? It is because I want to tell some novices that v2ray can drop the current mainstream FQ service in seconds. Trojan is blown up!Because v2ray is an all-rounder, there are really few UPs that can really make V2ray clear on YouTube. Because v2ray is more complicated to configure than other services, but it has powerful functions. In order to better hide the characteristics of the traffic, v2ray+tls+ws+nginx was born, TLS is a layer of encryption, and vmess is also a layer of encryption. However, the vmess protocol requires a relatively large amount of calculation. And Trojan’s Dansheng is improved in this respect, it is direct tls encryption, so it should be faster.

So is it true that v2ray cannot be compared with trojan?NO Today, let’s talk about socks! The socks protocol is definitely less computationally intensive than the vmess protocol. For example, ss, ssr, boork are finally connected to us by the socks5 protocol, and network games must pass through socks5, so it is impossible to calculate too much. Socks does not have that much encryption either, SOCKS is actually a network proxy protocol. SOCKS proxy is divided into SOCKS4 and SOCKS5. The difference between the two is that SOCKS4 proxy only supports TCP protocol (that is, transmission control protocol), while SOCKS5 proxy supports both TCP protocol and UDP protocol (that is, user data packet protocol). Various authentication mechanisms, server-side domain name resolution, etc. SOCKS5 that SOCK4 can do are available, but SOCK4 that SOCKS5 can do may not be able to do it! There is no need for time-based calculations like vmess.But I know that the socks protocol used to play games is definitely no problem. SOCKS is completely different from general application layer proxy servers. The general application layer proxy server works at the application layer and provides different processing methods for different network applications, such as HTTP, SMTP, etc. Once a new network application appears, the application layer proxy server cannot provide a proxy for the application , So the scalability of the application layer proxy server is not good; different from the application layer proxy server, the SOCKS proxy server aims to provide a generalized S proxy work and then the circuit layer (that is, between the application layer and the transport layer)!So today we will talk about v2ray+tls+ws+nginx! After the configuration is successful, v2ray (no vmess or vless protocol)+tls+ws+nginx! Speed ​​will certainly not let you down! Everyone knows ss or ssr! ! !

v2ray server

v2ray client configuration

Nginx configuration

install BBR

Tips

Please copy all code articles on this site for some YouTube UP to indicate the source! Please respect copyright and labor achievements!
entry.summary:
Trojan
15%
V2ay
90%

v2ray vmess multi-layer encryption is too safe to change socks, trojan stands at attention and stands! ! ! Do you really understand v2ray?

entry.title: V2ray vless+WS+TLS+Nginx
entry.content:
Currently VLESS does not have its own encryption, please use it for reliable channels, such as TLS.
VLESS is in the public beta. During the test, please ensure that both the client and server v2ray-core are the latest version.
The internal test warehouse of VLESS is rprx/v2ray-vless, and the new version of the PREVIEW series will be merged into [v2fly/v2ray-core] after a period of release (https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core). Please upgrade the v2ray core client to the latest version by yourself

Straightforward

No matter what vps you build, please test the server to your local delay, including the line, including vps uplink and downlink. Regarding the choice of vps, I don’t recommend any brand, because the region is different, choose the one that suits you. I have tested the code of each article. Some friends who build V2ray or other FQ services say that the card is slow. Install BBR first. Of course, if you don’t even know the basic performance of your own server, is it a bullshit? Knowledge needs to be accumulated, come on! Please also fight for yourself and respect knowledge! If you encounter any problems during the operation, welcome add public telegram group Please indicate the source of the site-wide script for some youtube UPs, please respect the fruits of labor

Install dependencies

Debian

Installation dependencies

Centos7

Installation dependencies

Execute the following code after installation

Install and update V2Ray

Code output

The latest maintenance version of v2fly pulls the latest data and outputs the following content "+" represents the current output content, "-" represents the information deleted on the basis of the old version

Install the latest geoip.dat and geosite.dat

Create and edit configuration files

Create a configuration file named config.json under /usr/local/etc/v2ray
Copy the following code to config.json

v2ray debugging

Set v2ray to boot up

Open port 80 (HTTP) and 443 (HTTPS) (If you have watched my previous videos, make sure the firewall rules are set, Google Cloud can ignore it. For other brand servers, please make sure that ports 80 and 443 have been opened. If not, try the following Code operation or server web side
Open http80 port and https 443 port)

You can also use the following commands to open these two ports: Please turn on the firewall yourself

Install NGINX

Nginx installed by the above method, all related configuration files are in the /etc/nginx/ directory
The main configuration file of Nginx is /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
*Nginx log files (access.log and error.log) are located in the /var/log/nginx/ directory. *

If you can’t use it successfully after the setup is complete, it may be due to the SElinux mechanism (if you are a user of CentOS 7, please pay special attention to the SElinux mechanism) preventing Nginx from forwarding data to the intranet
If this is the case, there will be no access information in the V2Ray log, and a large number of “Permission Denied” fields will appear in the Nginx log
To solve this problem, you need to type the following command in the terminal:

To verify whether Nginx is successfully started, you can open http://YOUR_IP in your browser. Note: Open it will display the centos webpage, but it prompts insecure websites that SSL encryption is not turned on https

Generate Certificate

*If you already have other certificates, you can ignore them, put the certificate and key in the specified directory of the server, just specify the certificate and key path in Nginx. There are too many ways to apply for a certificate. You can generate a certificate by installing the acme.sh tool or other methods to generate a certificate. You can search on Google. *

1. Install the acem.sh certificate generation tool. The following provides 3 methods to install, choose any one of them to install the certificate tool (Reminder: automatically upgrade acme.sh and enter acme.sh upgrade under root)

Install acme.sh through the above code and prompt red hold error. You can install dependencies according to the actual situation, such as installing socat or netcat


2. Generate the certificate path under the /root/.acme.sh file, you can check it yourself after installation
Reminder: There are many ways to generate a certificate through acme.sh:
For example — automatic DNS API integration such as: cloudflare DNS API token and use of global API key acme.sh supports most dns to generate certificates
For example — use DNS manual mode, and many other installation methods, if you are a good learner, you can Google

The generated certificate is as follows: This video only uses the designated port to generate the certificate. **It is recommended to use the 443 port to generate the certificate** (Generally, a single domain name is sufficient, after all, it is used for overcoming the wall without having to do so many bells and whistles. For baidu.com, it is not recommended to use www.baidu.com, because it is the front-end web over the wall, please customize such as tw.baidu.com, the prefix tw can be customized, please control three characters, the primary domain baidu.com and the secondary www .baidu.com can spare you understand)

1. Apply for a certificate by listening on port 80, if port 80 is occupied, please use port 443, please make sure these ports are open

2. If you use a non-standard port 80 behind the reverse proxy or load balancer, you can use –httpport to specify the port

3. Listen on port 443 to issue certificates, please make sure port 443 is open

4. If you use non-standard port 443 behind the reverse proxy or load balancer, you can use –tlsport to specify the port

-k means the length of the key, the following values ​​can be ec-256, ec-384, 2048, 3072, 4096, 8192, with ec means that the generated ECC certificate is, and if it is not, it is the RSA certificate. In terms of security, a 256-bit ECC certificate is equivalent to a 3072-bit RSA certificate

8. Install the certificate and key to the specified path

9. Configure NGINX *.conf

Reminder: Code comments do not need to be deleted and will not affect the operation, I just make it easier to understand
vi /etc/nginx/nginx.conf #Enter the edit configuration file: long press the D key on the keyboard to delete all configuration information, and then press the keyboard Ins key to enter the editing mode. Copy the following code and paste it into the configuration for editing, and fill in the corresponding one After configuring the information. Finally, press the shift+: key on the keyboard at the same time, enter wq to save and exit

The kit is as follows:
RSA

ECC

After modifying the Nginx configuration, be sure to reload the configuration. Enter sudo systemctl reload nginx.service #This must be done

Finally, please enter reboot to restart the server(remember to execute)

Query whether to enable ssl Open the website https://myssl.com/ssl.html and enter your own domain name, port 443 or open https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/index.html to query, you can also search for the keyword ssl on Google Query, many websites can query, whether the score has reached A level

Reminder: Please use the 443 port code to generate the certificate through the acme.sh tool as follows: sudo ~/.acme.sh/acme.sh –issue -d domain name –alpn -k ec-256 (listening to port 443 To issue a certificate, please make sure that port 443 is turned on. When you operate port 80 to generate a certificate according to the procedure of the article, you will be prompted that the port is occupied. Of course, if you want to be simpler, you can pass the certificate you have purchased or apply for the pagoda or other certificates, and put the key and certificate directly Copy the copy to the specified path of the server, and configure nginx to point to the certificate and path. Some free certificates will lack the CA certificate, so the website ssl score will be greatly reduced. The solution is to re-add the CA certificate.

Check whether the website has a lock by entering your domain name in the browser🔒 https is turned on, and the ssl score of the website domain name has reached A. If yes, congratulations on the successful construction. If you have learned it, then the next course will be better The more interesting it gets.

10. BBr installation

v2ray client

Please upgrade the client v2ray core to the latest version, add a custom configuration server, copy the following code and save it as **.json

Query tls on status

https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/index.html Enter your own domain name to query

If you want to uninstall V2Ray, execute the following code

Reminder: If you want to improve yourself in a short period of time, you can participate in my training. For many years of practical experience, you can participate in the excellent courses. Basically, you can't find the VIP courses on all platforms. Seeing blood for a while helps you get through the second line of the governor, everyone can be an expert。

Currently VLESS does not have its own encryption, please use it for reliable channels, such as TLS.
VLESS is in the public beta. During the test, please ensure that both the client and server v2ray-core are the latest version.
The internal test warehouse of VLESS is rprx/v2ray-vless, and the new version of the PREVIEW series will be merged into [v2fly/v2ray-core] after a period of release (https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core). Please upgrade the v2ray core client to the latest version by yourself

entry.title: Github API
entry.content:
For users who use Github, there are often some automation requirements. For example, my requirement is to regularly backup Github issues and comments locally. The following is a reference for using Github’s API

Basic Access Path (Root Endpoints)

When reading the document at the beginning, follow its example to curl directly on the command line, or access it in InSomnia or Postman software, and the 200 status is perfectly displayed. But once I rewrite my username in the link, it will display 404 without page. I thought it was an authorization problem, and then tried various ways in the header HEADER for username and token keys, but it was useless or 404. It turned out that it was not a problem with the method, but the link address was not written correctly!
In fact, if you just read it, you don’t need any authorization at all. You can directly enter the link in the command line, Insomnia, web page and other situations to access all public information of anyone.
Then check the official path list Root Endpoints to get the link, it seems that how to access it is wrong. Instead, I saw a link in Stackoverflow. I found various correct access paths along the way, summarized as follows:

First of all! The visited link cannot have / at the end. For example, https://api.github.com/users/solomonxie can access my personal information, but https://api.github.com/users/solomonxie/ does not work. The only difference is that there is one more/.
Second! Unlike general URL access, Github’s API access links are case sensitive!
Personal main information. https://api.github.com/users/ username, the data obtained is as follows:
image

Personally owned repo. https://api.github.com/users/username/repos. Will get a list of repo in JSON format.
Repo details. https://api.github.com/repos/username/warehouse name. The path of the repo began to be different from the personal information.
Get the content list of a repo. https://api.github.com/repos/solomonxie/gists/contents, note that this will only return the contents of the root directory.
Get the content list of subdirectories in the repo. https://api.github.com/repos/solomonxie/gists/contents/ directory name. It must be noted that the capitalization of the original file name must be completely followed here, otherwise the information cannot be obtained. If it is a deeper content, write the name of the directory in the link column in order.
Get information about a file in the repo (not including content). https://api.github.com/repos/solomonxie/gists/contents/ file path. The file path is the full path of the file and is case sensitive. Only basic file information will be returned.
Get the original content (Raw) of a file. 1. Extract the download_url link from the above file information, and then you can get its original content. 2. Or visit directly: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/username/warehouse name/branch name/file path
A list of all commits in the repo. https://api.github.com/repos/username/warehouse name/commits.
Details of a certain commit. https://api.github.com/repos/username/warehouse name/commits/SHA of a certain commit
List of issues. https://api.github.com/repos/username/repository name/issues.
Details of an issue. https://api.github.com/repos/username/warehouse name/issues/ serial number. Issues are listed in the order of 1, 2, and 3.
A list of comments in an issue. https://api.github.com/repos/username/warehouse name/issues/serial number/comments.
Details of a comment. https://api.github.com/repos/Username/Repository Name/issues/comments/ ID of comment details. The comment ID is obtained from the issues list.

Query parameters (Parameters)

If you add query conditions to the basic link above, then the returned data is filtered. For example, it is required to return only the open issues, or to display the list data in pages. Commonly used as follows:

Paging function. The format is?page=page number&per_page=each page contains number.
Such as https://api.github.com/users/solomonxie/repos?page=2&per_page=3

Issue status. The format is?state=state.
Such as https://api.github.com/repos/solomonxie/solomonxie.github.io/issues?state=closed
entry.summary: For users who use Github, there are often some automation requirements. For example, my requirement is to regularly backup Github issues and comments locally. The following is a reference for using Github’s API

entry.title: V2ray+WS+TLS+Nginx
entry.content:
Synchronize server time

centos7

Update server yum update -y (Some systems prompt NO packages marked for update, no need to update)
Set the server time to be adjusted to the local country time zone date -R is to view the current server time

Debian

Install dependent programs

debian

update and Install curl

centos7

update and Install curls

Continue code installation

v2ray update

code output

The output content of different v2ray versions will be different

install release.sh

edit configuration files

Create a configuration file named config.json under /usr/local/etc/v2ray
Copy the following code to config.json

v2ray debugging

Set v2ray to boot up

open http 80 prot and https 443 prot

install NGINX

Nginx installed by the above method, all related configuration files are in the /etc/nginx/ directory
The main configuration file of Nginx is /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
Nginx log files (access.log and error.log) are located in the /var/log/nginx/ directory

If you can’t use it successfully after the setup is complete, it may be due to the SElinux mechanism (if you are a user of CentOS 7, please pay special attention to the SElinux mechanism) that prevents Nginx from forwarding data to the intranet
If this is the case, there will be no access information in the V2Ray log, and a large number of “Permission Denied” fields will appear in the Nginx log
To solve this problem, you need to type the following command in the terminal:

To verify whether Nginx is successfully started, you can open http://YOUR_IP in the browser. Note: Open it and display the centos webpage, but it prompts insecure websites that SSL encryption is not turned on https

Generate tls certificate

1.Install the acem.sh certificate generation tool. The following 3 methods are provided. Choose any one of the methods to install the certificate tool (Reminder: automatically upgrade acme.sh and enter acme.sh upgrade under root)

2. Generate the certificate path under the /root/.acme.sh file, you can check it yourself after installation
Reminder: There are many ways to generate a certificate through acme.sh:
For example — automatic DNS API integration such as: cloudflare DNS API token and use of global API key acme.sh supports most dns to generate certificates
For example — use DNS manual mode, and many other installation methods, if you are a good learner, you can Google

The generated certificate is as follows: This video only uses the designated port to generate the certificate. **It is recommended to use the 443 port to generate the certificate** (usually a single domain name is sufficient, after all, it is used to overcome the wall and do not need to do so many fancy multi-domains, such as: main domain baidu.com is not recommended to use www.baidu.com, because it is the front-end web that overturns the wall, please customize such as tw.baidu.com, the prefix tw can be customized, please control three characters, the main domain baidu.com and the secondary www .baidu.com can spare you understand)

Apply for a certificate by listening on port 80, if port 80 is occupied, please use port 443, please make sure these ports are open

Listen to port 443 to issue certificates, please make sure port 443 is open

If you use non-standard port 443 behind the reverse proxy or load balancer, you can use –tlsport to specify the port

-k means the length of the key, the following values ​​can be ec-256, ec-384, 2048, 3072, 4096, 8192, with ec means that the generated ECC certificate is, if not, it is the RSA certificate. In terms of security, a 256-bit ECC certificate is equivalent to a 3072-bit RSA certificate

tls move

Configure *.conf

vim /etc/nginx/nginx.conf #Enter the edit configuration file: long press the D key on the keyboard to delete all configuration information, and then press the keyboard Ins key to enter the editing mode. Copy the following code and paste it into the configuration for editing, and fill in the corresponding one After configuring the information. Finally, press the shift+: key on the keyboard at the same time, enter wq to save and exit

After modifying the Nginx configuration, must be to reload the configuration. Enter sudo systemctl reload nginx.service #This must be done

Finally, please enter reboot to restart the server(remember to execute)

Check whether ssl is enabled. Open the website https://myssl.com/ssl.html and enter your own domain name and port 443 or open https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/index.html to query, you can also search for the keyword ssl on Google Query, many websites can query, whether the score has reached A level

Reminder: To generate a certificate through the acme.sh tool, please use the 443 port code as follows: sudo ~/.acme.sh/acme.sh –issue -d domain name –alpn -k ec-256 (listen to port 443 To issue a certificate, please make sure that port 443 is turned on. Follow the procedure of the article to operate port 80. When generating a certificate, you will be prompted that the port is occupied. Of course, if you want to be simpler, you can pass the certificate you have purchased or apply for the pagoda or other certificates, and put the key and certificate directly Copy the copy to the specified path of the server, and configure nginx to point to the certificate and path. Some free certificates will lack the CA certificate, so the website ssl score will be greatly reduced. The solution is to re-add the CA certificate.

Check if you find that the website has a lock by entering your domain name in the browser🔒 https is turned on, and the ssl score of the website domain name has reached A. If yes, congratulations on the successful construction. If you have learned it, then the next course will be better The more interesting it gets.

BBr installation

uninstall V2Ray

Query tls status

https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/index.html Enter your own domain name to query

Basically, you can't find the VIP courses on all platforms. If you see blood, you can get through the second line of Ren and Du. Everyone can be Expert.

entry.content:
Finalshell SSH connection tool download
Mobaxterm SSH connection tool download

1. Server time synchronization

Set the hardware clock to be consistent with the local clock, set the time zone to Shanghai date -R is to view the current time of the server
centos7 time synchronization

Debian system synchronization time is as follows:

debian

Installation dependencies

centos7

Installation dependencies

2. Install dat and release.sh

3. Install and update V2Ray

Install v2ray and enter the following

The latest maintenance version of v2fly pulls the latest data and outputs the following content "+" represents the current output content, "-" represents the information deleted on the basis of the old version

4. Install the latest geoip.dat and geosite.dat

5. Create and edit configuration files

Create a new config.json configuration file under /usr/local/etc/v2ray
Copy the following code to config.json

v2ray debugging

Set v2ray to boot up

6. Generate a certificate

*If you already have other certificates, you can ignore them. Put the certificate and key in the specified directory of the server. There are too many ways to apply for a certificate. You can generate a certificate by installing the acme.sh tool or other methods to generate a certificate. You can search on Google. *

1. Install the acem.sh certificate generation tool. The following provides 3 methods to install, choose any one of them to install the certificate tool (Reminder: automatically upgrade acme.sh and enter acme.sh upgrade under root)

Install acme.sh through the above code and prompt red to hold wrong. You can install dependencies according to the actual situation, such as installing socat or netcat

2. Generate the certificate path under the /root/.acme.sh file, you can check it yourself after installation
Reminder: There are many ways to generate a certificate through acme.sh:
For example — automatic DNS API integration such as: cloudflare DNS API token and use of global API key acme.sh supports most dns to generate certificates
For example — use DNS manual mode, and many other installation methods, if you are a good learner, you can Google

The generated certificate is as follows: This video only uses the specified port to generate the certificate It is recommended to use the 443 port to generate the certificate (Generally, a single domain name is sufficient, after all, it is used to overcome the wall and do not need to do so many bells and whistles, such as the main domain baidu. com is not recommended to use www.baidu.com because it is the front-end web over the wall, please customize such as tw.baidu.com, the prefix tw can be customized, please do not write too long, the main domain baidu.com and secondary www.baidu. com can spare you understand)

1. Apply for a certificate by listening on port 80, if port 80 is occupied, please use port 443, please make sure these ports are open

2. If you use a non-standard port 80 behind the reverse proxy or load balancer, you can use –httpport to specify the port

3. Listen on port 443 to issue certificates, please make sure port 443 is open

4. If you use non-standard port 443 behind the reverse proxy or load balancer, you can use –tlsport to specify the port

-k means the length of the key, the following values ​​can be ec-256, ec-384, 2048, 3072, 4096, 8192, with ec means that the generated ECC certificate is, and if it is not, it is the RSA certificate. In terms of security, a 256-bit ECC certificate is equivalent to a 3072-bit RSA certificate

Reminder: If port 80 or 443 is occupied and we cannot apply for the key and certificate, we can block the port through kill and apply again.

7. Install the certificate and key to the specified path

/etc/v2ray (path can be customized)

Modify /etc/v2ray/v2ray.key to 644 permissions

8. BBr installation

9. Query tls on status

https://www.ssllabs.com/ssltest/index.html Enter your own domain name to query
About config.json configuration file can be written by yourself, of course, it also includes various other load balancing, reverse proxy. If you want to improve yourself in a short time, you can participate in my training class.

entry.title: v2ray官方新老脚本安装

下载 V2Ray

  1. Github Release: github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core
  2. Github 分流: github.com/v2ray/dist
  3. Homebrew: github.com/v2ray/homebrew-v2ray
  4. Arch Linux: packages/community/x86_64/v2ray
  5. Snapcraft: snapcraft.io/v2ray-core
  6. 原安装脚本已被弃置，由 fhs-install-v2ray替换。

老版本安装

此脚本会自动安装以下文件：

此脚本会配置自动运行脚本。自动运行脚本会在系统重启之后，自动运行 V2Ray。目前自动运行脚本只支持带有 Systemd 的系统，以及 Debian / Ubuntu 全系列。

运行脚本位于系统的以下位置：

编辑 /etc/v2ray/config.json 文件来配置你需要的代理方式；
运行 service v2ray start 来启动 V2Ray 进程；
之后可以使用 service v2ray start|stop|status|reload|restart|force-reload 控制 V2Ray 的运行。

entry.title: Set server login password
entry.content:
centos7

After getting root privileges, modify the SSH configuration file /etc/ssh/sshd_config

Set a password, enter it twice, enter do not prompt any characters

Restart the SSH service, and finally use the account as root and the password for the third-party SSH login that you just set.

Debian 9 and 10

Set a password, enter it twice, enter do not prompt any characters

Restart the SSH service, and finally use the account as root and the password for the third-party SSH login that you just set.
entry.summary:
centos7

After getting root privileges, modify the SSH configuration file /etc/ssh/sshd_config

Set a password, enter it twice, enter do not prompt any characters

Restart the SSH service, and finally use the account as root and the password for the third-party SSH login that you just set.

entry.title: Firewall settings
entry.content:
1. View firewall status

Basic use of firewalld
systemctl is the main tool in the service management tools of CentOS7, which integrates the functions of the previous service and chkconfig
start up:

View:

stop:

Disable:

Service: /sbin/chkconfig –add foo put the newly generated foo.service under /usr/lib/systemd/system/, and then use the load command to import systemctl load foo.service
Start a service:

Turn off a service:

Restart a service:

Display the status of a service:

To enable a service at boot:

Generally, the machine needs to be restarted, otherwise the settings made later may not take effect

Two, open or restrict ports

  1. Open ports
    If we need to open the 22 port that needs to be used when shell connection

Among them, the role of –permanent is to make the settings take effect permanently, otherwise the machine will become invalid after restarting.

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

You can check whether it takes effect through the following command

The following command can view all ports opened by the current system

Three, limit ports

For example, we now need to turn off the 22 port just opened

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

Go to check all the open ports of the system, there is no 22 port

Four, batch open or restrict ports

Open ports in batches. For example, we have to open all ports from 100 to 500

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

Check all the open ports of the system, you can see that all ports from 100 to 500 have been opened

Similarly, the batch limit port is

Five, open or restrict IP

  1. Restrict IP address access
    For example, restricting the IP address of 192.168.0.200 to prohibit access to port 80 means prohibiting access to the machine

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

View the rules that have been set

  1. Remove IP address restrictions
    Remove the restricted 192.168.0.200

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

Check the rule settings again and find that there is no 192.168.0.200 limit

If the settings are not effective, you can try to edit the rules file directly, delete the original setting rules, and reload the firewall.

  1. Limit IP address segment
    For example, we need to restrict the IP of the entire segment of 10.0.0.0-10.0.0.255 and prohibit them from accessingAmong them, 10.0.0.0/24 means starting from the IP 10.0.0.0, 24 represents the subnet mask is 255.255.255.0, which contains a total of 256 addresses, that is, a total of 256 IPs from 0-255, which just limits this entire The IP address of the segment, the specific setting rules can refer to the following table

Reload the firewall settings to make the settings effective

Check the rules to confirm whether they are in effect

Similarly, the opening limit is

方法三.校准时间同步上海时间时区 date -R 查看vps时间

Debian系统同步时间如下：

2.crontab服务

1.开启crontab,如果提示错误需要安装crontab,则输入代码无任何提示表示已经开启

2.输入提示绿色返回值证明已经安装并且开启

3.安装crontab：(有些系统没有安装crontab则需要安装,如果系统本身已经安装了请跳过这一步骤)

服务操作说明：

5.crontab -e
输入i键,复制以下代码ctrl+c,黏贴ctrl+v然后输入shift+:在输入wq保存并且退出加入计划任务,可自定义添加需要的功能

以上脚本可自行编写多功能脚本

entry.title: Brook crontab use
entry.content:
Choose one of the following synchronization time. If you cannot synchronize the local time, please google the next one (keywords such as centos7 or centos6 or debian time synchronization local time)

Method 1. Calibrate time and synchronize local time date -R view vps time sudo -i root permission to enter
``
yum -y install ntp ntpdate //install ntpdate tool
ntpdate cn.pool.ntp.org //Set the system time to synchronize with the local network time
hwclock –systohc //write system time into hardware time

** crontab service **
``
/ sbin / service crond start (open crontab without any prompt indicating it has been opened)
/sbin/service crond status (view status)

crontab -e (Enter the i key, copy the following code ctrl + c, paste ctrl + v to join the scheduled task, you can customize and add the required functions)

``

  • / 1 * * * *Date>>~/a.log 2>&1
  • / 1 * * * * sudo journalctl -b -u brook >>~/ a.log 2>&1
  • / 1 * * * * /bin/systemctl restart brook.service >>~/a.log 2>&1
entry.summary: Choose one of the following synchronization time. If you cannot synchronize the local time, please google the next one (keywords such as centos7 or centos6 or debian time synchronization local time)

entry.title: Brook install
entry.content:
1. Update server

  1. Enter sudo -i to enter root privileges, you can choose to upgrade the kernel, yum update -y upgrades the kernel
  2. yum install wget download wget toolwget https://github.com/txthinking/brook/releases/download/v20190205/brook download brook server version
  3. Enter cp brook /usr/bin to copy brook to the bin directory
  4. chmod +x /usr/bin/brook gives the current path brook executable permissions
  5. brook -h #View help
  6. nohup ./brook server -l :80 -p pass1234 & add brook port and password and let brook run in the background

Copy the following code

Brook settings start with the system

vi /etc/systemd/system/brook.service Create brook.service startup script with vi
To
Press “i” to enter insert mode, enter the script as follows

Press Esc, enter “shift+:”, enter wq, press Enter, save and exit

Give executable attributes and take effect:

Open brook.service service

reboot restart vps

Check if brook service is running normally

The following code:

install BBR

systemctl list-unit-files Check whether the Brook script takes effect. After re-modifying the Brook password, we need to reload the information and enter systemctl daemon-reload or restart vps and enter reboot
entry.summary:
1. Update server

  1. Enter sudo -i to enter root privileges, you can choose to upgrade the kernel, yum update -y upgrades the kernel
  2. yum install wget download wget tool

entry.title: v2ray下载安装
entry.content:
v2ray主要特征

  • 多入口多出口: 一个 V2Ray 进程可并发支持多个入站和出站协议，每个协议可独立工作。
  • 可定制化路由: 入站流量可按配置由不同的出口发出。轻松实现按区域或按域名分流，以达到最优的网络性能。
  • 多协议支持: V2Ray 可同时开启多个协议支持，包括 Socks、HTTP、Shadowsocks、VMess 等。每个协议可单独设置– 传输载 　体，比如 TCP、mKCP、WebSocket 等。
  • 隐蔽性: V2Ray 的节点可以伪装成正常的网站（HTTPS），将其流量与正常的网页流量混淆，以避开第三方干扰。
  • 反向代理: 通用的反向代理支持，可实现内网穿透功能。
  • 多平台支持: 原生支持所有常见平台，如 Windows、Mac OS、Linux，并已有第三方支持移动平台

v2ray在以下平台中可使用

  • Windows 7 及之后版本（x86 / amd64）；
  • Mac OS X 10.10 Yosemite 及之后版本（amd64）；
  • Linux 2.6.23 及之后版本（x86 / amd64 / arm / arm64 / mips64 / mips）；包括但不限于 Debian 7 / 8、Ubuntu 12.04 / 14.04 及后续版本、CentOS 6 / 7、Arch Linux；
  • FreeBSD (x86 / amd64)；
  • OpenBSD (x86 / amd64)；
  • Dragonfly BSD (amd64)；
  • IOS/安卓/软路由等

下载 v2ray

  • Github Release: github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core

  • Github 分流: github.com/v2ray/dist

  • Homebrew: github.com/v2ray/homebrew-v2ray

  • Arch Linux: packages/community/x86_64/v2ray

  • Snapcraft: snapcraft.io/v2ray-core

  • 压缩包均为 zip 格式，找到对应平台的压缩包，下载解压即可使用。

验证安装包

  • V2Ray 提供两种验证方式：
  1. 安装包 zip 文件的 SHA1 / SHA256 摘要，在每个安装包对应的.dgst文件中可以找到。
  2. 可运行程序（v2ray 或 v2ray.exe）的 gpg 签名，文件位于安装包中的 v2ray.sig 或 v2ray.exe.sig。签名公钥可以在代码库中找到。

Windows 和 Mac OS 安装方式

  • 通过上述方式下载的压缩包，解压之后可看到 v2ray 或 v2ray.exe。直接运行即可。

Linux 发行版仓库

  • 部分发行版可能已收录 V2Ray 到其官方维护和支持的软件仓库/软件源中。
  • 出于兼容性、适配性考虑，您可以考虑选用由您发行版开发团队维护的软件包或下文的安装脚本亦或基于已发布的二进制文件或源代 码安装。

Linux 安装脚本

  • V2Ray 提供了一个在 Linux 中的自动化安装脚本。这个脚本会自动检测有没有安装过 V2Ray，如果没有，则进行完整的安装和配 置；如果之前安装过 V2Ray，则只更新 V2Ray 二进制程序而不更新配置。

  • 以下指令假设已在 su 环境下，如果不是，请先运行 sudo su。

  • 运行下面的指令下载并安装 V2Ray。当 yum 或 apt-get 可用的情况下，此脚本会自动安装 unzip 和 daemon。

  • 这两个组件是安 装 V2Ray 的必要组件。如果你使用的系统不支持 yum 或 apt-get，请自行安装 unzip 和 daemon

  • 此脚本会自动安装以下文件：

  • 此脚本会配置自动运行脚本。自动运行脚本会在系统重启之后，自动运行 V2Ray。目前自动运行脚本只支持带有 Systemd 的系 统，以及 Debian / Ubuntu 全系列。

  • 运行脚本位于系统的以下位置：

  • 脚本运行完成后，你需要：

  • 输入vi/etc/v2ray/config.json文件来配置你需要的代理方式；

  • 运行 service v2ray start 来启动 V2Ray 进程；

  • 之后可以使用 service v2ray start|stop|status|reload|restart|force-reload 控制 V2Ray 的运行。

  • go.sh 参数

  • go.sh 支持如下参数，可在手动安装时根据实际情况调整：

  • -p 或 –proxy: 使用代理服务器来下载 V2Ray 的文件，格式与 curl 接受的参数一致，比如 “socks5://127.0.0.1:1080” 或 “http://127.0.0.1:3128"。

  • -f 或 –force: 强制安装。在默认情况下，如果当前系统中已有最新版本的 V2Ray，go.sh 会在检测之后就退出。如果需要强制 重装一遍，则需要指定该参数。

  • version: 指定需要安装的版本，比如 “v1.13”。默认值为最新版本。

  • local: 使用一个本地文件进行安装。如果你已经下载了某个版本的 V2Ray，则可通过这个参数指定一个文件路径来进行安装。

示例如下：

  • 使用地址为 127.0.0.1:1080 的 SOCKS 代理下载并安装最新版本：./go.sh -p socks5://127.0.0.1:1080

  • 安装本地的 v1.13 版本：./go.sh –version v1.13 –local /path/to/v2ray.zip

  • V2Ray 提供了两个预编译的 Docker image：

  • v2ray/official: 包含最新发布的版本，每周跟随新版本更新；

  • v2ray/dev: 包含由最新的代码编译而成的程序文件，随代码库更新；

  • 两个 image 的文件结构相同：
entry.summary:
v2ray主要特征

  • 多入口多出口: 一个 V2Ray 进程可并发支持多个入站和出站协议，每个协议可独立工作。
  • 可定制化路由: 入站流量可按配置由不同的出口发出。轻松实现按区域或按域名分流，以达到最优的网络性能。
  • 多协议支持: V2Ray 可同时开启多个协议支持，包括 Socks、HTTP、Shadowsocks、VMess 等。每个协议可单独设置– 传输载 　体，比如 TCP、mKCP、WebSocket 等。
  • 隐蔽性: V2Ray 的节点可以伪装成正常的网站（HTTPS），将其流量与正常的网页流量混淆，以避开第三方干扰。
  • 反向代理: 通用的反向代理支持，可实现内网穿透功能。
  • 多平台支持: 原生支持所有常见平台，如 Windows、Mac OS、Linux，并已有第三方支持移动平台
